page.title: 15A COUNCIL HOUSE (2Oth CENT.)
page.content: When we first moved into our house it was horrible.There was an old fashioned bath on stands. The kitchen had 3 cupboards up to the roof. There was a coal fire in the living room and bedroom.Then the council modernised it. We were given a nice bathroom suite, lots of cupboards, a gas fire and central heating. When we bought our house from the council we changed the shape of the kitchen and bathroom. We put in a burgundy bathsuite and a shower. In the living room we put a stone fireplace,wood panelling and a smoked mirror alcove with a hanging light.We put heaters in the bedrooms. BEDROOMS.(1)cream wallpaper,double wardrobe,2 built-in cupboards,pink polyester duvet+covers (2)flowery wallpaper single wardrobe patchwork- design duvet on single bed,strawberry design duvet on single bed.
